description: Erection of a rear dormer, side dormer and installation of one roof light to front roof slope
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation/use of the development.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.5539999999999998;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">i) Details of the proposed dormer (rear and side) windows in the form of 1:5 vertical section drawings of details showing the material, profile and dimensions of the glazing bars at their junction with the glazing units; the location and depth of the glazing units.&nbsp;<br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">ii) Details of all materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-43ac94cc-7fff-5e1c-02ca-cc509dba96ad"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory, and preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Northwold &amp; Cazenove Conservation Area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Conservation Style Rooflight:&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The rooflight shall be a conservation type; flush fitting, narrow profile, steel rooflight with a central glazing bar.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7b0c5053-7fff-853d-6f51-0429ae4c0906"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">REASON: To ensure that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the surrounding area.&nbsp;<br></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of two</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span><br></p><p><span style="text-align: justify;"><br></span></p><p>REASON: In the interests of biodiversity.<br></p>
